summary: This simple mod replace all current vanilla horses including Shadowmere and Frost into new slim version.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]Description[/b][/size]
This simple mod replace all current vanilla horses including Shadowmere and Frost into new slim version.

[size=3][b]Installation[/b][/size]
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data

[size=3][b]Tools Used[/b][/size]
3Ds Max
NIFScope

[size=3][b]Credits[/b][/size]
Holugar for modeling

[size=3][b]Video[/b][/size]
[youtube]-b7ABy0tT64[/youtube]

[size=3][b]My other Mods[/b][/size]
Unicorn [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13606#]Download Page[/url]
author: Holugar
